long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Available features:

- Hide promoted stories
- Hide filler widgets
- Better Dark Mode
- Simplify navigation
- Exclude authors (AO3 Savior-style)

How to use:

1. Navigate to www.asianfanfics.com.
2. Click the extension icon.
3. Click the toggles to enable/disable features as you see fit. Hover over the tooltip icons for more information.
4. Press "Save Changes" to save your settings, or press "Revert" to return to your previously saved configuration.

Permissions used:

- Storage — Save configuration
- activeTab — Automatically refresh page on save
- Host — Inject CSS and JavaScript into Asianfanfics.com
